alert.note: Alert for Clay; Clinton; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 3:30PM CDT until July 14 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clinton County in northwestern Missouri... Western Clay County in west central Missouri... Northeastern Platte County in west central Missouri... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 330 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ferrelview, or near Platte City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Gladstone, Smithville, Platte City, Weatherby Lake, Claycomo, Pleasant Valley, Lake Waukomis, Trimble, Ferrelview, Platte Woods, Oakview, Tracy, Farley, Oakwood Park, Oakwood, Oaks, Ridgely, Kansas City Intl Arpt and Hoover. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 11 and 13. Interstate 29 between mile markers 7 and 24. Interstate 435 between mile markers 25 and 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
